scripts.build: vite build && cp start.sh dist/start.sh && cp start.bat dist/start.bat && chmod +x dist/start.sh && cp server.js Arcwright-dist/server.js && cp dist/index.html Arcwright-dist/index.html && rm -rf Arcwright-dist/assets && cp -r dist/assets Arcwright-dist/assets && cp dist/Arcwright-1600.png Arcwright-dist/Arcwright-1600.png && cp dist/favicon.png Arcwright-dist/favicon.png && cp dist/mascot.png Arcwright-dist/mascot.png
